item.description: BitTorrent Sync allows you to keep files synchronized between multiple computers or mobile devices. It’s a handy way to do backups, share files with friends, or automate the movement of data from device to device. It comes with a web frontend, called the Web UI, that allows for connections over HTTP or HTTPS. Using HTTP across the internet to administer Sync seems totally absurd, so I decided to enable HTTPS.
